Title: The Boy
Overview: An American nanny is shocked that her new English family's boy is actually a life-sized doll. After she violates a list of strict rules, disturbing events make her believe that the doll is really alive.
Tagline: Every child needs to feel loved.
Keywords: suicide, england, fire, country house, shower, nanny, mask, boy, murder, mansion, violence, doll, burn victim, secret passageway, broken mirror, loss of a child
production_companies: Lakeshore Entertainment, Vertigo Entertainment, Diamond Films, Showtime Networks, STX Entertainment
Cast: Lauren Cohan, Rupert Evans, James Russell
